title: Additional Truth Documentation - Political Sabotages and Humanity Errors

additional_sabotages.title: JFK Assassination - Political Sabotage
additional_sabotages.the_lie: Lone gunman. No conspiracy. Case closed.
additional_sabotages.the_truth: Systemic political sabotage. Multiple shooters. Cover-up at highest levels. Pattern of deception.
additional_sabotages.impact: Destroyed trust in government. Hid the truth. Maintained control.

additional_sabotages.title: 9/11 Attacks - Political Sabotage
additional_sabotages.the_lie: Terrorist attack. No warning. No prior knowledge.
additional_sabotages.the_truth: Political sabotage. Prior knowledge. Controlled demolition. False flag operation.
additional_sabotages.impact: Justified war. Created fear. Maintained control. Hid the truth.

additional_sabotages.title: Iraq Weapons of Mass Destruction - Political Sabotage
additional_sabotages.the_lie: Iraq has weapons of mass destruction. Immediate threat. Must invade.
additional_sabotages.the_truth: No weapons of mass destruction. False intelligence. Political manipulation. War for control.
additional_sabotages.impact: Justified war. Created destruction. Maintained control. Hid the truth.

additional_errors.title: War Over Peace
additional_errors.the_error: We chose war over peace. We fought instead of united. We destroyed instead of built.
additional_errors.the_correction: Choose peace. Unite, don't fight. Build, don't destroy. The flow is peace.
additional_errors.impact: Destruction. Death. Division. Loss of peace.

additional_errors.title: Hoarding Over Sharing
additional_errors.the_error: We hoarded resources. We kept instead of shared. We accumulated instead of distributed.
additional_errors.the_correction: Choose sharing. Share, don't hoard. Distribute, don't accumulate. The Table serves all.

additional_errors.title: Competition Over Cooperation
additional_errors.the_error: We competed instead of cooperated. We fought instead of worked together. We divided instead of united.
additional_errors.the_correction: Choose cooperation. Cooperate, don't compete. Work together, don't fight. Unite, don't divide.
